textBeforeTable: Fox Racing Size chart cycling Recommended Use: two side, one zipped cargo, one cargo flap Pockets: regular Fit: yes Removable Chamois: yes, EVO Chamois: 10 in Inseam: quick-dry polyester Material: Tech Specs The Fox Racing Ranger Cargo 10in Shorts - Men's are available in the colors Black, Dark Khaki, Charcoal, and Orange, and in even sizes from 28 to 40. The Ranger Cargo Shorts are also loaded with pocket space. One of the large thigh pockets is zippered, so you won't lose your keys or whatever else you can't afford to drop. A specialized media pocket with audio interface takes care of your MP3 player, and a large thigh cargo pocket with a hook-and-loop flap adds more valuable storage. Don't let the subtle styling fool you
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
